page.title: 14 Housing
page.content: Most houses are{owner/occupied.Tied {cottages}on private land still exist. There are 2{private housing estates}in this block with plans for more houses in North Petherwin.The population of about 500 is a mixture of retired and young families.There are few{council {houses,}so there is no encouragement for young marrieds to remain here. Properties in need of renovation have been bought by people from out county,on completion some sell and the price is often too high for local people. Some farms provide{bed and {breakfast}for holiday makers who often become regular visitors.Low income families are assisted to pay rates or rent. Houses may have wood burning stoves, bottled gas or electric cookers.Water is metered and paid for per 1000 gallons. The 2 villages are supplied with{North Sea Gas.
